channel.title: Mac Compatibility
channel.description:
Sorry if this is the wrong section - fairly sure it's right. :P
Anyway, I recently got a new iMac computer so I can't run all my favourite RSPS Webclients on here, it just comes up with the message "Error Loading, Please Report."
I have a rough idea of why this is happening - but can somebody tell me how I can get around this and start playing the game (if possible).

item.title: Mac Compatibility
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

i think a start would be downloading the latest version of java.
if that doesnt work , then repost on here.
also check that you have the cache saved on whatever is equivelant to a c: drive on a mac.
i’ve never owned a mac.

Read full topic
